_category.title: String Functions
_category.description: UPPER, LOWER, SUBSTRING, TRIM, CONCAT, LENGTH, and more

string-1.title: Text Case Conversion
string-1.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  UPPER(product_name) AS uppercase,
  LOWER(product_name) AS lowercase
FROM products
LIMIT 5;
string-1.description: Convert text to uppercase and lowercase

string-2.title: String Extraction
string-2.sql:
SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  SUBSTRING(first_name, 1, 1) AS first_initial,
  LENGTH(last_name) AS last_name_length
FROM employees
LIMIT 8;
string-2.description: Extract substrings and measure string length

string-3.title: Text Trimming
string-3.sql:
SELECT
  '  ' || product_name || '  ' AS padded,
  TRIM('  ' || product_name || '  ') AS trimmed,
  LENGTH('  ' || product_name || '  ') AS padded_length,
  LENGTH(TRIM('  ' || product_name || '  ')) AS trimmed_length
FROM products
LIMIT 5;

string-4.title: String Concatenation
string-4.sql:
SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  first_name || ' ' || last_name AS full_name,
  CONCAT(last_name, ', ', first_name) AS formatted_name
FROM employees
LIMIT 8;
string-4.description: Combine strings using || operator and CONCAT function

string-5.title: LEFT and RIGHT Extraction
string-5.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  LEFT(product_name, 5) AS first_5_chars,
  RIGHT(product_name, 5) AS last_5_chars
FROM products
WHERE LENGTH(product_name) >= 10
LIMIT 6;
string-5.description: Extract characters from start and end of strings

string-6.title: String Replacement
string-6.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  REPLACE(product_name, 'a', '@') AS replaced,
  REPLACE(product_name, ' ', '_') AS underscored
FROM products
WHERE product_name LIKE '%a%'
LIMIT 6;
string-6.description: Replace characters or substrings within text

string-7.title: String Search
string-7.sql:
SELECT
  first_name,
  last_name,
  POSITION('a' IN LOWER(first_name)) AS first_a_position,
  POSITION('e' IN LOWER(last_name)) AS first_e_position
FROM employees
WHERE POSITION('a' IN LOWER(first_name)) > 0
LIMIT 8;
string-7.description: Find position of substring within text

string-8.title: Text Reversal
string-8.sql:
SELECT
  product_name,
  REVERSE(product_name) AS reversed,
  UPPER(REVERSE(product_name)) AS reversed_upper
FROM products
LIMIT 5;
